_header: As here I am sent by Divine Providence
Note:
For emendations see Mabbott (1950)
XMabbott, T. O. “The Text of the English Xylographic Poem on the Seven Virtues.” Modern Language Notes 65 (1950): 545, 545.
_description: Moralizing verses for a pageant or mumming, spoken by Faith, Charity, Temperance, Justice, Force, Hope, and Prudence — seven 8-line stanzas
